summary: Diff implements smoother 3-decimal quantity editing via intermediate-string state with commit-on-blur/Enter normalization, and adds extensive A5-focused print CSS (A5 @page, print-only overrides, hiding controls, compact sizing) aimed at fitting the whole sheet on one printed page.

hallucinated_features.description: Allowing negative intermediate quantity inputs (e.g., "-" and "-.") during editing.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-17 specifies natural decimal entry patterns like "1.", ".5", "10.2" but does not request negative quantities; the diff explicitly permits negative intermediate states.
